Verses: 1 ippadiyirukka, Parama Azhaippukku Pangullavargalaagiya Parisuththa Sagodharare, Naam Arikkaipannugira Apposthalarum Piradhaana Aasaariyarumaayirukkira Kiristhu Yesuvaik Gavaniththuppaarungal;
2 mose Dhevanudaiya Veettil Engum Unmaiyullavanaayirundhadhupola, Ivarum Thammai Erpaduththinavarukku Unmaiyullavaraayirukkiraar.
3 veettai Undupanninavan Veettaippaarkkilum Adhiga Ganaththirkuriyavanaayirukkiraan; Adhupola Moseyaippaarkkilum Ivar Adhiga Magimaikkup Paaththiraraayirukkiraar.
4 enenil, Endha Veedum Oruvanaal Undaakkappadum; Ellaavatraiyum Undupanninavar Dhevan.
5 sollappadappogira Kaariyangalukku Saatchiyaaga, Mose Panividaikkaaranaai, Avarudaiya Veettil Engum Unmaiyullavanaayirundhaan.

6 kiristhuvo Avarudaiya Veettirku Merpattavaraana Kumaaranaaga Unmaiyullavaraayirukkiraar; Nambikkaiyinaale Undaagum Dhairiyaththaiyum Menmaipaaraattalaiyum Mudivubariyandham Urudhiyaaip Patrikkondiruppomaagil Naame Avarudaiya Veedaayiruppom.
7 aagaiyaal, Parisuththa Aaviyaanavar Sollugirapadiye Indru Avarudaiya Saththaththaik Ketpeergalaagil,
8 vanaandharaththile Kobamoottinabodhum, Sodhanainaalilum Nadandhadhupola, Ungal Irudhayangalaik Kadinappaduththaadhirungal.
9 ange Ungal Pidhaakkal Ennai Sodhiththu, Ennai Pareetchaipaarththu, Naarpadhu Varushakaalam En Kiriyaigalai Kandaargal.
10 aadhalaal, Naan Andha Sandhadhiyai Arosiththu, Avargal Eppozhudhum Vazhuvippogira Irudhayamulla Janamendrum, Ennudaiya Vazhigalai Ariyaadhavargalendrum Solli;
11 ennudaiya Ilaippaarudhalil Avargal Piravesippadhillaiyendru Ennudaiya Kobaththile Aanaiyitten Endraar.
12 sagodharare, Jeevanulla Dhevanaivittu Vilaguvadharkedhuvaana Avisuvaasamulla Pollaadha Irudhayam Ungaliloruvanukkullum Iraadhapadikku Neengal Echcharikkaiyaayirungal.
13 ungalil Oruvanaagilum Paavaththin Vanjanaiyinaale Kadinappattup Pogaadhapadikku, Indru Ennappadumalavum Naadorum Oruvarukkoruvar Puththisollungal.
14 naam Aarambaththile Konda Nambikkaiyai Mudivupariyandham Urudhiyaaippatrikkondiruppomaagil, Kiristhuvinidaththil Pangullavargalaayiruppom.
15 indru Avarudaiya Saththaththai Ketpeergalaagil, Kobamoottudhalil Nadandhadhupola Ungal Irudhayangalai Kadinappaduththaadhirungal Endru Solliyirukkiradhe.
16 kettavargalil Kobamoottinavargal Yaar? Moseyinaal Egipthilirundhu Purappatta Yaavarum Appadi Seydhaarkalallavaa?
17 melum, Avar Naarpadhu Varushamaai Yaarai Arosiththaar? Paavanjseydhavargalaiyallavaa? Avargaludaiya Savangal Vanaandharaththil Vizhundhupoyitre.
18 pinnum, Ennudaiya Ilaippaarudhalil Piravesippadhillaiyendru Avar Yaaraikkuriththu Aanaiyittaar? Keezhppadiyaadhavargalaik Kuriththallavaa?
19 aadhalaal, Avisuvaasaththinaale Avargal Adhil Piravesikkakkoodaamarponaargalendru Paarkkirom.
